Text: Leave a comment if you are satisfied or unsatisfied; this is my first torrent, so let me know if there are any mistakes.

Thank you for actually sharing! Download went fast and all songs sound great :). 

However, you added two songs twice:

Songs of Storms
Lost Woods

If you could remove two of them and fix it, the torrent would be smaller and people wouldn't have unnecessary duplicates. Other than that: perfect!
Oh, Gerudo Valley is also in there twice!
Great Torrent! Aside from the duplicates, which increase size/time, it's awesome. I love the new song.
Duplicates? That's quite odd, but I'll upload a new torrent without them. For some reason, ThePirateBay doesn't let me edit this current torrent, so I guess i'll make a new one.
That's odd, I'll make a new torrent and try to fix that problem. Honestly, the folder i uploaded into the torrent only had a single copy of every song, so I have  no idea how there are duplicates.
